name: title
Kononenko 25mm beam JTBEQ 52 wks: Kinematic of 52-week-old JTBEQ mice walking on a 25 mm wide beam

name: description
Kononenko 25mm beam JTBEQ 52 wks: Original SIMI videos, DeepLabCut-tracked videos and csv files of body kinematics of 52-week-old VGAT-Cre;Atg5flox/flox mice walking on a wide 25 mm beam. Mixed group of control and mutant mice. Individual trials for each mouse are recorded from 8 cameras and metadata for synchronization is stored as *.smp files.
